name: Delphinia Chronicle
description: Fully developed PC Action RPG game! All we need is your vote and steady interest!! Any questions are welcomed!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7, 8, 10 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Ram DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1024 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Dual core 2Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1024MB Video Ram DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1024 MB available space
